1.3.3.en: Moved installation instructions from app store to community support topic

1.3.4.en: Fixed issue with relative volume action card.

1.3.5.en: Fixed issue with start / stop playing trigger cards.

1.3.6.en: Another fix for issue with start / stop playing trigger cards.

3.0.0.en: Updated to SDK3 (require Homey firmware 5.x) and fixed an issue with the start/stop playing trigger card.

3.0.1.en: Updated to SDK3 (require Homey firmware 5.x) and fixed an issue with the start/stop playing trigger card.

3.0.2.en: Updated to SDK3 (require Homey firmware 5.x) and fixed an issue with the start/stop playing trigger card and removed a duplicate "is (not) playing" condition card. You might have to update your flows because of this.

3.0.3.en: Updated to SDK3 (require Homey firmware 5.x) and fixed an issue with the start/stop playing trigger card and removed a duplicate "is (not) playing" condition card. You might have to update your flows because of this.

3.0.4.en: Updated to SDK3 (require Homey firmware 5.x) and fixed an issue with the start/stop playing trigger card and removed a duplicate "is (not) playing" condition card. You might have to update your flows because of this.

3.0.5.en: Updated to SDK3 (require Homey firmware 5.x) and fixed an issue with the start/stop playing trigger card and removed a duplicate "is (not) playing" condition card. You might have to update your flows because of this.

3.0.7.en: This release contains no functional changes but only updates for used framework due to security issues.

3.1.0.en:
Correctly handling playing/non-playing states.
Upgraded project structure to Homey Compose.
New maintainer.

3.2.0.en:
Now showing track, artist and album.
Added album art display.
Implemented shuffle and repeat functions.
Fix for crash when service was unknown.
